title: Irelia's Model is so bloody big in game
body: She's as tall as Mordekaiser, taller than Rengar and it seems like she could do with being about 10% smaller.

replies.body: it's because of her mobility.  She has to be easier to click

> [{quoted}](name=Sèx Crazed Eve,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-07T11:29:40.675+0000)
>
> it's because of her mobility.  She has to be easier to click

{{champion:157}} {{champion:55}}
They learned their lesson
That way riot can justify 200 attack range too
she be thot thicc

What if we all had it wrong and Irelia is actually like 8 feet tall?

#Showerthoughts

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-04-07T18:13:19.841+0000)
>
> What if we all had it wrong and Irelia is actually like 8 feet tall?
> 
> #Showerthoughts

She’s standing on top of a mountain.

She’s at least 35000 ft tall
Morde is actually kinda small for what he is tho

Mordekaiser is one of the last remnants of the Pizza dynasty, who were dwarf men with massive feet, and Rengar has a hunch so I don't think it's too bad. Newer League characters in general are a little bigger than old ones.
It’s for gameplay reasons

> [{quoted}](name=immortalibra,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-07T13:42:12.518+0000)
>
> It’s for gameplay reasons

Wat?
she has to be easy to click because she dashes so much

> [{quoted}](name=Sunbreaker,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-04-07T16:12:57.315+0000)
>
> she has to be easy to click because she dashes so much

Cool, make her hitbox bigger too.

> [{quoted}](name=AmazoX,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-07T17:23:15.475+0000)
>
> Cool, make her hitbox bigger too.

There would be clarity issues then. 

I know Blitz and Thresh hooks exist, as well as all the other crazy hit boxes for champs and skills, but doesn’t change the fact /shrug.

> [{quoted}](name=JustMonika13,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IEWXy9cj,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-08T00:28:46.630+0000)
>
> There would be clarity issues then. 
> 
> I know Blitz and Thresh hooks exist, as well as all the other crazy hit boxes for champs and skills, but doesn’t change the fact /shrug.

:-(
*places dancing Aetherwing Kayle into the size comparison*

Yeah it makes her homeguard animation really weird.

One of her blades actually has to increase in size for her to ride it.  Was honestly the first thing i noticed when playing her.
I was thinking the same thing too,she would look way better with a smaller model,she literally looks like a giant,doesn't fit her theme

I definitely think morde's the problem and not irelia when it comes to comparing the two. 

{{champion:82}} needs to grow thiccer like

https://pa1.narvii.com/6628/b8b8691614eb6fb5aad005bcad38c863404371a8_hq.gif

The models have size-creep. Especially in the way the legs move around - Irelia's model isn't actually much larger than Katarina. But her legs jut out more, and the perspective isn't as much top-down (it's more about 45 degrees).
Look at some old champs like Jax. Jax is supposed to be a massive warrior but I think ATM he looks about 5 feet tall.

It's not like Zoe's head wouldn't compete with entirety of Vayne's model.
It's not like Malphite, basically a moutain or Aurelion who smashes stars with fingers wouldn't be of similar size to Morde, too.
I feel the same about rakan, seems gigantic in size due to his outfit.
she is definitely way too tall . I thought i was the only one .

Yeah it's kinda like Vayne. She's so big like wth.
Morde is very small tho, sadly. :(
not to mention {{item:3053}}
